case.state: Hey, I'm Rose! Sorry, am I the last one here? I didn't mean to be late!
Oh, am I late? Sorry about that, everyone! I'm Rose, nice to meet you!
Hey! What's up? I'm Rose, nice to meet you!
This game seems like it'll be a nice little break. I'm Rose, nice to meet you!
Looks like I'm the first one here. Nice to meet you, ~player~. I'm Rose!
I was hoping we weren't going to draw attention to that until it happened... Thanks, Fina.
Hey, Kuroi! I know you really wanted to see me, so, here I am! Keep on being a silly goober. You already know I'm a bit of a playful cat...
I may not be a water goddess, a half-vampire half-succubus, or even a mouse girl, but I'm glad you decided to play with me, Mymans!
I-If I had a penis, I'd share it with you, but I don't.
Oh, hey, Wasp. I'm glad you could play this game on your `Kindle', I think it was called?

I have a message for you, ~player~. It was... uhm... "Screenshot this and use it to tell people to subscribe to your you-tube channel."
I don't get it, can you explain?
If I May? More like... If U June. Hah!
I'm sure you're used to being surrounded by pussy already, Salty! Hehe.
Wait, you really want us to call you ~player~? Hah, well, if you want to, sure!
Woah! A-Are you a squid +Anima? I didn't even know such a thing existed.
Er... Uhm... You forgot something, ~femnude~...
Not quite as good as the springs in Bubbly, but the atmosphere is still pretty good!
I really needed a break from things. Am I the only girl here? Huh.
I'm the only girl here, huh? Well... Go easy on me, boys!
I wasn't expecting to be the only girl here, but I'm not complaining, hehe!
(Another person with animal traits? I've never seen ears like those... could they be a +Anima too?) Hmm...
I feel like I'm surrounded by a bunch of jokes that I don't understand...
What a bunch of jokers. Is this really who I'm playing with?
I-Is this place haunted or something?
Wah?! Is this place haunted? G-Ghosts...
Alright, let's get it started! I really needed a break from things.
Getting to see cute people get naked? What more could a girl ask for?
I've really been meaning to blow off some steam, so I can already tell this is gonna be great!
Reset 4player_latejoin
Do we need to swap? No? In that case, I'll keep all of mine.
Oh, man... I think I need to swap all five. I can do that, right? Because I've got nothing!
Oh, I don't need to swap any of these!
I don't need to swap any cards!
I don't need to swap any, I got a good hand already!
I'm good, thanks!
And again, I need to swap all five...
Please give me five new cards... Myah.
I'll swap five. I can't even make a pair with these.
The smartest decision I could make would be to get rid of all five. So I'll do that.
I'd like to swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Uhm... I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Let's see... I'd like to swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Aha! I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Oh, I know! I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hey, nice! I think I'm off to a good start with this.
I'm not overly familiar with this game, but I think I'm off to a good start!
Yay! I did it!
Lucky me!
With catlike intuition, heh heh!
Sometimes, when I'm traveling the high roads, there are these cool rocks that get revealed when there's been a lot of rain. I've made a few trinkets with them!
I made a good sale last week. This travelling merchant really liked some of the butterfly-themed earrings I made. I think he wanted to give them to his sister.
The games they run here are nothing like what I saw back home. Poker is about the only thing that is familiar to me.
My cards are pretty good this round. I hope that helps you out.
I can hardly wait to see how this plays out!
I've totally got this! All I had to do was pay attention to the card thingies!
Cats are meant to bring good luck, right? You'll want to keep me around, hehe!
There are all kinds of +Anima out there. I once met this guy who was actually a hamster +Anima... he kept his space change in one of his cheeks, it was weird.
I've been a cat +Anima for almost as long as I can remember. It's second nature now.
I'm really glad I can be myself for once. And I never imagined it would be in a place like this!
This is the longest I've shown off my +Anima when I'm not fighting. I guess I just feel comfortable!
What do you think of my claws, ~player~? They're cool, right?
Hm? ... I thought I heard something over this way. I guess not.
Hmm. Not a bad start, I think.
I'm not really familiar with this game, but I think I've got an okay start.
Card games were never a big thing in Astaria, so I may get a few things wrong...
Just gonna do a biiig stretch...
I'm really enjoying the atmosphere of this place. It's so cozy.
Maybe I'll get lucky, and one of you will lose instead. Or you could lose on purpose?
If we were playing for keeps, I could wager some of my trinkets. I make them myself, you know!
A card game is not nearly as fun if you know what you're doing!
It's kind of strange to think about, but some of the people that come here could probably take over Astaria singlehandedly...
I'm glad that nobody I recognise comes here. It'd be pretty awkward to explain why I decided to come here. I just needed a break.
It's way too easy to feel competitive, even if there isn't really a prize for winning.
Anybody want to buy me a drink later? I don't have any local money, but I'll trade you some fancy earrings for the cost!
Hmm... I don't know about this one.
I think my chances are pretty good! Well, pretty average.
No peeking at my cards! Wait until it's time to show them off.
If I learned how to weave and cut jewels all by myself, I can do this by myself too.
Hey, no peeking!
C'mon, Rose, be confident in yourself...!
I'm quite lucky that my +Anima markings can pass for tattoos. It helps to avoid any awkward conversations if I get seen like this.
It's been a while since I've run into other +Anima. Probably for the best, really. Fights can break out if normal people get invovled...
It's funny that sometimes, you can just tell someone is a +Anima. Lots of them have to hide it when they're in bigger towns, though.
They say if you stay in your +Anima form all the time, day and night, then you might eventually turn into the animal completely... I don't think it's true, but I don't wanna risk it.
There's a group of people called the Kim-un-kur who live in the mountains. All of them have +Anima, or so they say. I actually met one, a while ago...
Ehehe... I'm not used to showing off this much of myself. I usually keep my +Anima hidden if I can help it, too.
I'm fine showing off my cat side, but don't make any pussy jokes, okay? I once slapped a guy who... nevermind.
It feels a bit drafty in here, doesn't it? Or maybe it was too stuffy in my clothes.
Good thing we're inside. I don't really want to be caught naked with a bunch of strangers while in the great outdoors.
It's pretty drafty out here, isn't it? I'm getting chills!
One of the last times I was in a hot spring, I had to help my friends deal with this bison +Anima. Turns out the guy was just misunderstood and needed to relax like the rest of us.
C'mon, can't you boys go easy on me? I'm not exactly a difficult opponent...
What happened to chivalry? Can't you boys go a little easy on me?
Oh, man. How'd I end up in a spot this bad? I'm naked and about to lose again, and the rest of you aren't showing anything! Nnnh...
Ah! I'm not off to a great start. I'm not familiar with card games.
I'm not familiar with this game, but I can already tell that I'm off to a bad start.
How'd I end up in a spot like this? Out of clothes and about to lose again? Nnngh...
Out of clothes, and about to lose again... How'd you end up in this spot, Rose? Nnngh...
Ah, well. Mistakes happen! No sense getting caught up about it.
I just can't seem to get it right, huh?
I'll survive, don't you worry about me!
Nothing ventured, nothing gained. That's what my grandmother used to say.
I know what a king and a queen are, but what's the "J" stand for? Jester?
I was hoping to do a little better than this...
Hrm...
Hmm... Nope, nothing good can come of this.
You know how you can usually tell when a storm is coming by the way animals act? Yeah, that, but with poker card... thingies.
+Anima aren't exactly treated the best. The best you can hope for is that a normal person treats you with indifference.
Grr... I need to be careful. It's hard to hold the cards when my nails come out!
The worst experience I've ever had trying to sell my wares? Any time the local soldiers decide to `shake me down' and check what I have.
~blank~
Ehehe! Here, I'll join in too. Give it a try, Aella!
Hehe! Here, I'll join in too. Have a look at my boobs. Feel like joining in, Aella?
Careful where those hands go, Mia. I think Aqua might get the wrong idea, hehe~
Magic, huh? Well, you did summon it out of thin air, so that makes sense to me!
Oh... Her armor disappeared, but she's fine. Phew.
Thanks for the view, Gloria. You should probably turn around now, hehe!
One of my best dreams is that I'm laying in a meadow, on a nice sunny day, without a care in the world... If only, right?
In my case, these aren't actually tattoos, Yunyun. They're my +Anima markings! I guess they're kind of spiritual.
Well, no. I normally don't do this sort of thing to begin with. To~background.time~ just felt a bit special...
Yeah! It basically means I have some catlike qualities that I can show off if I want to. They come in handy, and mean a lot to me...
Team Magma... huge expanses of land...
Do... all Team Magma Grunts have such huge... expanses of land?
So, you two are playing with the same hand, right? We had a free space, so I guess I just assumed Pandoria was playing by herself.
A Crimson Demon, huh? Well, demon or not, you're going to have to play fair like the rest of us!
I have no idea what Maggie is talking about...
That phone thingy of yours sure is interesting... more interesting than what's going on here, is it?
Oh, take a look at this. I've got a scar on my back. Pretty cool, isn't it? Well, I've never actually seen it properly.
Oh! I've got another scar, on my back. See? It's pretty cool, or so I've been told. I've never gotten a good look at it.
Huh. What's that thing you've got there, ~player~? The... `camera'?
If you wanna look at me through that camera thingy, go ahead, ~player~! Does it make me look different or something?
It feels a little crowded in here, doesn't it? I barely have space to stretch my legs!
I'm starting to feel pretty comfortable here. The rest of you seem fine enough. Maybe I should show off my +Anima more, not that you'd really know what it is.
You all seem to be pretty decent people, so maybe I should show this off. I'm actually a cat +Anima. Ah, you might not know what that is...
Hehe... You know, if you make me lose another couple of times, you'll get to see my girlies. Here, have a little peek~
Say... If you can make me lose another couple of times, you'll get to see my girls. Here, I'll give you a little preview~
You should try a little harder if you want me to lose. Here, I'll be nice and let you see these for a second... Feel motivated yet?
They say people are supposed to lose their +Anima when they're at peace... I've never really felt at peace while I still have someone to look after.
If it wasn't obvious, my +Anima is a cat! That means I've got cat claws, cat eyes, and catlike reflexes, heheh!
Oh, sure. Lady Jakuzure... It doesn't really roll off the tongue as well.
Say... You're not a +Anima, are you, ~kin~? Just checking...
I don't mean to pry, but you aren't a +Anima, are you, ~kin~?
Wait, did I say that you should buy things for me? I meant you should buy those things from me!
These kinds of scars are pretty common when you're a +Anima. It's like we get drawn to trouble, or something...
Hey! My nails aren't that bad, are they?
I guess they're kinda long, but at least I can hide 'em at will. I don't need to be in my +Anima form all the time.
Oh, me? Thank you, Yuno! I like your hair, too! Very brown.
Oh, really? What makes you say that, Yuno?
My country is a bit of a sparsely populated place, Meia. There's a lot of wilderness between the towns, so I spent a lot of time on the road when I travel.
+Anima aren't looked upon very favorably where I come from. There's a lot of superstition and fear around us, and it doesn't help that the way you become one is dangerous...
There's still a lot of superstition about +Anima. They aren't looked upon very favorably, and the way you become one is really dangerous.
Uhm... excuse me? You must have me confused for someone else.
I don't know who you're referring to, but it can't be me...
Actually, I found this one a few days ago, Kyoko. They're pretty common in southern Astaria, and... well, it's a rose, so it fits me!
That's true, Maggie. I've never thought about it too much, but if I had a couple of mirrors, maybe I could.
Nobody is born as a +Anima, except for the Kim-un-kur clan... I think. People become +Anima in times of crisis... a life or death situation.
Being a +Anima isn't something you're born with, unless you're part of the Kim-un-kur clan, I think. People become a +Anima in order to... survive...
Yeah, Meia. I have to travel in order to sell my wares and get new goods and supplies. Plus, I have to look after my little bro, and we can't stay with our uncle any more...
I have to travel the road to sell my wares and pick up new materials. Oh, and I have to look after my little brother. We don't have a permanent home at the moment.
Twice in a row? Okay, still no problem.
I lost again? Heh, maybe I should take things seriously for once.
Okay... Whenever I lose, I lose twice in a row, huh?
Really? Okay, so, whenever I lose, I lose twice in a row. Now we know that.
And again, it happens twice in a row. Talk about bad luck!
Oh for crying out loud! Every time I lose, I lose again! What kind of bad luck is that?
I guess I spoke too soon, huh? Was that little tease all it took for you to take me seriously?
I suppose I shouldn't have taunted the rest of you, hehe!
Ah, looks like i'm the first one. That's a shame, I haven't thought of what to say yet!
Okay... ~witty~, I know you like to tease, but you aren't allowed to make a {small}`pussy'{!reset} joke, okay?
Can't you have a little pity for a cute cat like me?
My turn again? Hehe... Sure, you've got it.
Guess I'll need to try a little harder. Oh well!
Can't you have a little pity for a cutie like me?
And that's about all I can do... I'm down to my last.
Yeah, yeah. I'll take pity on you guys, hehe!
Looking at you guys, I think I'm still in the lead, so don't get over-confident!
Ah, dang! Looks like I'm up. So much for a flawless Rose victory, heheh!
My turn again! This is pretty fun, I've gotta say. Though I may eat my words later...
At least I'm not the only one going through this. Not that I feel like quitting, or anything! It's just nice to have company.
I was hoping for it to take a little longer for me to lose. You all came prepared...
Dang. Ah well, no point in crying over spilled milk, as they say.
How about cutting me a little slack, here? I'm already losing, aren't I?
Pretty savage way of saying that I actually get outdoors, Jura.
That's a pretty brutal way of saying that I have to go outside, Jura.
Hehe! Well, it's not every day that I can feel comfortable sharing my +Anima side, Jura. Some people are afraid of it.
Yeah! It's actually a common one that grows in my home country. I have to get a new one every couple of weeks...
Well, yeah, that's true! Plus, I have to defend myself now and again, so I'm no pushover. I guess you can always count on me to pull through!
Phone? Take pictures? I'm interested!
Huh? No, I just thought it looked cute! I don't wanna take it off. I always try to find one, it completes my look!
Uhm... Okay? I don't know what you're even saying, but okay.
Keep it together, Rose... you're just taking your ~clothing~ off in front of some cute boys. No big deal.
Hnnhh... Stay cool, Rose. You're just taking ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off in front of some cute boys, no big deal...
I hope you boys are paying attention, because I'm really putting myself out there...!
I'm pretty confident in travelling alone. I've been all across the land to sell my wares - charmes, jewels, and other trinkets, all made by hand!
I usually have to travel alone to make a sale. I'm a peddler by trade, selling cool charms and jewels that I make myself!
If you wanna know more about me, I work as a peddler. I can make all sorts of accessories, bits and bobs... hm. I should've brought some with me.
I'm not a cobbler, but I know a good pair of shoes from a bad pair.
My boots are well-worn, since I have to travel so much to sell my wares. I know how to pick out a pair that'll last a while.
I know my boots aren't exactly squeaky clean. They're travelling shoes, and I can't really afford a new pair. Maybe if I could sell you something?
This old thing gets pretty dusty. It used to be a little more vibrant than this.
I learned how to sew clothes back together years ago. It's really handy, especially since we can't ususally afford better clothes.
I always feel light as a feather whenever I take my pants off. They're pretty hefty, aren't they?
My pants are pretty heavy, actually. That's good, though -- it means they're durable!
I feel a bit guilty for coming here, truth be told. Like, I should be working, but here I am... taking my pants off for you all.
Hehe. Alright, here goes... I hope you all appreciate this!
Okay, this should slip right off... Here we go!
No big deal, just baring my chest for total strangers...
My heart won't stop beating. I can't tell if I'm scared or excited, maybe both!
I hope you appreciate what this means for me! My heart won't stop pounding, knowing I'll be naked in front of you all...
... I'd better just do it. Okay, one, two... three!
Oh! In that case... uhm... take a picture, Maggie! I don't know how you do it, but... eh?
Oh, don't worry, Yuno! I struggle with that too, hehe...

state.text: Yeah! And... well, I have my secret weapon -- my cat +Anima!

case.state: Well, yeah, haha! They last a week or two depending on the time of year. But I have to travel a lot anyway, so I'm always finding more!
Yeah, here they are. My girlies, out in the open for everyone to see... The rest of you should follow my lead.

That wasn't nearly as bad as I thought it'd be.
Just don't stare for too long! You might be next!
These markings on my shoulders look like tattoos, right? Well, they aren't. They're actually +Anima markings.
See these markings? They aren't tattoos, though I know they look like them! They're actually my +Anima markings.
Oh, these aren't actually tattoos. I'm a cat +Anima; these are my +Anima markings. I guess I better show off this side of myself -- it's what makes me special, after all!
Looks can be decieving, so I'll let you know that these aren't actually tattoos. I'm a cat +Anima, and these are my +Anima markings. I should probably show it off a little.
If you ever want to accessorise in a new way, just ask me! I'll get my stuff when we're done here!
When we're done here, if you're at all interested in buying some new accessories from me, just ask! I'll even work for commission!
When we're done here, if you're at all interested in buying some new accessories for me, just ask! I'll even work for commission!
Nnaahhh... Feels good to stretch my toes!
Being on the road means I've met some pretty interesting people! Lots of friends... {small}and plenty of people to avoid.{!reset}
Oh yeah, here's a scratch I got a while back. They're kinda common when you live the kind of life I have. I think a coyote gave me this one?
Oh, you can see one of my scars. I got this one fighting a coyote, I think? When you're a +Anima, this sort of thing is pretty common...
Yeah, here they are. My girlies, out in the open for everyone to see...

That wasn't nearly as bad as I thought it'd be.
Just don't stare for too long!
Well, here I am!
Enjoying the view? Hehe!
This is a placeholder, you aren't supposed to see this! Please send a bug report.
You're a kind of cat person, right? Not that you like cats, but... you're a cat, right, ~target~?
I wish I had your confidence, ~target~. Plus, girls can't really go around being completely topless all the time.
Phew! Kinda glad it's not me.
It's kind of a shame someone always has to lose. I'd love to keep chatting all ~background.time~ long.
Come on, ~target~. There's no need to be shy. We're all rooting for you!
Yeah! I like where this is going.
Looks like it's your turn, ~name~. This should be great!
Such a shame, but there's always next time, hehe!
Do the rest of us proud, ~target~!
I was kind of hoping it would be you, ~target~. Sorry!
Thanks for taking the heat on this one, ~target~!
Nice! Was wondering who'd be next.
Don't keep a girl waiting!
I can't wait to see where we go from here...
Go ahead, ~name~. We'll be watching you with big expectations...
What's a little risk without a little reward, hmm? A reward for us, I mean.
What if I called you a good boy, would that motivate you? Hehe!
And here I thought I'd have to imagine what would happen if you lost again!
Oh, yeah! What's that whole team of yours about, Maggie? Tell us!
Wait, what's this about water? Oh yeah, you're part of that whole team thingy...
I didn't know other cultures didn't see it as taboo for a woman to go topless. Or... are you just different like that?
Thanks for taking the heat on this one. I thought I'd had it.
It's kind of a shame someone always has to lose. I'd love to keep chatting all ~background.time~ long.
Don't hold out on us, ~target~. We're really eager to see you strip!
I'm lookin' forward to this one!
This is gonna be fun. Strip for us, ~target~!
You'll do better next time, hehe!
Do the rest of us proud, ~target~!
Phew. I'm glad to be the lucky one! Well, not the unlucky one.
The early bird gets the worm, and the unlucky player takes the loss.
Hehe! Sorry, but you're next, ~target~. That's how it goes.
Hey, nice. You're up, ~target~.
How can I offer my encouragement?
Don't make me beg for it, ~target~, just take something off!
Sorry, ~target~. That's just how life goes.
From one player to another, I'm sorry, but not that sorry.
A tie, huh? Gee, what are the odds of that?
Another tie, huh? What are the odds of that?

Another... tie...?
Okay, did someone mess with the deck?
What the heck is going on? How are there so many ties this game?
Are we cursed or something? That's five ties now, right?

Okay, that's it, I've run out of funny tie hand dialogue. I'm breaking the fourth wall. If you want to see a character made for spnati, then do it yourself. There, I said it. Now, let's move on with the game -- assuming you weren't cheating or hacking to get this many ties in a single game.
Woo! This is great!
Oh, you're such a tease... Do it more.
Playing hard to get, huh? I like it a lot.
Oh, that's a great idea, yeah.
Not too shabby!
Is that a trendy style where you're from? For guys, I mean.
If you want me to take a look at it, I can. I could fix up any little notches or...
Saving the bigger hitting stuff for later, huh? Makes sense.
Don't mind if I admire the eye-candy. That's you by the way, ~target~!
Playing around with our hearts like that... Hehe!
Put ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ down gently...
Don't give up because you lost one little round, ~target~!
Hnn... Nice.
Don't get too complacent or it'll bite you in the end!
How do you make that look like fun? I could learn a thing or two...
You're really such a sweetie, you know...
So, it's come down to this... Hehe!
Looks cute!
Interesting... they don't have ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ in Stella, I think.
Not bad, not bad!
Wonder if I can make a comeback from this...
I had no idea water was that dangerous. I've heard about some bad storms here and there, but nothing this bad...
I suppose there are a lot of scary creatures that lurk in th depths...
You're being such a tease, hehe! I like it.
All of you is worth admiring, and doing it this way just makes that even more obvious.
Not a bad choice, all things considered. Let's move on, okay?
I'll be nice and let you get away with that, hehe!
Nice, but you might lose again, you know!
You might wish you'd held on to ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~ later, since you might lose again!
Cool! Let's keep the ball rolling!
My heart is starting to thump in my chest...
I can understand wanting to start small, but ending small?
Yeah, that's a fun way of doing things!
Hey, not bad!
I should really try to market my stuff to men. They don't like fancy jewelry unless they're buying it for their girlfriends.
Ah, I really see why you're going for ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Woo! You go, ~target~!
Were you trying to throw us off guard? Or just have a little bit of fun? Hehe!
You know how to play the game and make it fun, huh? I'll keep an eye on you...
You've still got a chance, so don't give up, even when it seems difficult!
As long as you're having fun, that's what really matters.
I can tell that you take care of yourself, ~target~.
You really know your stuff, huh?
Really? Is that so?

Oh! You're a monkey now... I see.
(Is she a monkey +Anima?)
You go, girl!
Heh, I'm surprised you didn't take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off sooner!
Hah... That's a neat way of looking at you-- I mean, it-- I mean... the game.
You're really dressed to impress, aren't'cha?
If you ever want some new jewelry, I'm your girl! I can make things to order in any style!
Wow, you're really going for it, huh?
A little bit of practice pays off!
That's such a lewd display... You've got guts, Gloria. I could never imagine doing something like that.
Aw, Maggie, you look really cute with your hood off!
Maggie, you look stunning without that hood of yours! You're a real cutie!
Are you even shorter, or is that just my mind playing tricks on me?
(Wait, how thick were those heels of hers? She looks even shorter than before!) Good job, Nonon!
Huh...
You really know how to party, don't you?
Gosh, leave some for the rest of the game, why don't you!
And now we get to see how you look without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~...
I can tell that you take care of yourself, ~target~.
Thank's for showing us your stuff, ~target~.
Yeah, I get ya. I totally get ya.
Yeah, that's the good stuff.
Oh yeah, that's it! That's what I came here to see.
I didn't realize it'd be this easy to get you out of your ~clothing~. Some kind words and a sweet smile? Hehe!
Really going all out to try and impress me, huh? Well, i don't mind.
Good choice, but I'll be keeping an eye on you from now on!
This is a pretty good look for you. You should try losing more often. Ah... Sorry, was that mean?
I really like what I'm seeing here...
I'm really enjoying my time here...
I'm feeling really pumped for whatever comes next.
Waaahh?!
Take ~clothing.ifPlural(those things|it)~ off, already!
Wow, look at you, ~target~!
Have no fear, just do it! The more you think about it, the harder it'll be...
Your wings are really cute, Mari! You almost look like a bat +Anima!

Your wings are really cute, Mari!
(She almost looks like a bat +Anima...)
Wah! She's exploding?!
A donut? How does that even work? When you eat something, where does it go?
Hehe! You look really cute, Gwen! So much better without that mask in the way!
I've never seen a transformation like that... why do you look and feel so different now?
That was nothing like a +Anima transformation... why do you look so different now? Why do you feel different?
Those scars just show that you're a tough girl, Misato!
We girls have to look out for each other, right? I'll look out for you, ~target~...
That's a good look on you-- I mean, for you, ehehe...
This is something worth seeing... I'm glad I came here, really.
